name: Unicorn HAT Scripts
tagline: Projects/scripts for Pimoroni's Raspberry Pi Unicorn HAT
body:
## Unicorn HAT Scripts

Please find here some Open Source Python scripts for @pimoroni's Unicorn HAT. Included is `unicorntools.py`, a module with some extra helper functions for working with the HAT.

### Documentation

Check out the scripts themselves to see what they do. Although they're in development, I endeavour to comment what's going on at each step.

### Disclaimer

Always check through the code for each script and make sure you're happy with what it's doing. I haven't had any problems with them, but your mileage may vary. Each script is without warranty and for use at your own risk. I am not responsible for any fried Pis, HATs, or any other damages that may occur from use of the scripts.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
